**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- Made of smooth, white wood, this staff is capped at each end with a golden cross adorned with a multitude of ruby cabochons. A staff of healing grants an item bonus to the Hit Points you restore anytime you cast the [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell using your own spell slots or using charges from the staff. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Healing **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The item bonus granted to _heal_ spells is +1.
  • **Cantrip** [_stabilize_](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
  • **1st** _heal_
Staff of Healing (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 470 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The item bonus granted to _heal_ spells is +2.
  • **2nd** _heal_, [_restoration_](/Spells.aspx?ID=258), [_restore senses_](/Spells.aspx?ID=259)
  • **3rd** _heal_, [_remove disease_](/Spells.aspx?ID=251)
Staff of Healing (Major) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 1,800 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The item bonus granted to _heal_ spells is +3.
  • **4th** _heal_, _restoration_
  • **5th** [_breath of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=29), _heal_, _remove disease_
Staff of Healing (True) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 9,200 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The item bonus granted to _heal_ spells is +4.
  • **6th** _heal_, _restoration_, _restore senses_
  • **7th** _heal_, [_regenerate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=248), _remove disease_
name: Staff of Healing
